title: Macho Man Draven
body:
So I didn't originally come up with this idea, I saw a thread a while back talking about how a Macho Man 
Randy Savage themed Draven skin would be cool, and I agreed with that. I liked the idea so much that I had to paint it. So here it is, I hope it is up to the Macho Man standards.

Idea thread link: [Here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/ijewJgwu-i-have-an-idea-for-a-new-draven-skin-and-wanted-to-post-it-here)

replies.body:

The Macho Man would be proud.

What I really like is how it totally makes sense on many levels; Draven is an entertainer, he can duo with Braum, he's more of a US wrestler rather than a Luchador so it's not redundant, and it pays tribute to one of the best we'll ever see.

I can just imagine him catching Elise in J4's Cataclysm and re-enacting that great scene from Spiderman... "Hey freak-show, you're goin NOWHERE" >:D
this would fit so well with el tigre braum, considering they they have good synergy together
I love it.  An awesome tribute to Macho Madness.  Erik Braa even said he based a lot of Draven's energy and cockiness on that Pro Wrestler-like persona.
